details:
OpenOffice.org Security Team reports:

> Fixed in OpenOffice.org 3.3
>
> * [CVE-2010-2935 / CVE-2010-2936](http://www.openoffice.org/security/cves/CVE-2010-2935_CVE-2010-2936.html): Security Vulnerability in OpenOffice.org related to PowerPoint document processing
> * [CVE-2010-3450](http://www.openoffice.org/security/cves/CVE-2010-3450.html): Security Vulnerability in OpenOffice.org related to Extensions and filter package files
> * [CVE-2010-3451 / CVE-2010-3452](http://www.openoffice.org/security/cves/CVE-2010-3451_CVE-2010-3452.html): Security Vulnerability in OpenOffice.org related to RTF document processing
> * [CVE-2010-3453 / CVE-2010-3454](http://www.openoffice.org/security/cves/CVE-2010-3453_CVE-2010-3454.html): Security Vulnerability in OpenOffice.org related to Word document processing
> * [CVE-2010-3689](http://www.openoffice.org/security/cves/CVE-2010-3689.html): Insecure LD\_LIBRARY\_PATH usage in OpenOffice.org shell scripts
> * [CVE-2010-3702 / CVE-2010-3704](http://www.openoffice.org/security/cves/CVE-2010-3702_CVE-2010-3704.html): Security Vulnerability in OpenOffice.org's PDF Import extension resulting from 3rd party library XPDF
> * [CVE-2010-4008 / CVE-2010-4494](http://www.openoffice.org/security/cves/CVE-2010-4008_CVE-2010-4494.html): Possible Security Vulnerability in OpenOffice.org resulting from 3rd party library LIBXML2
> * [CVE-2010-4253](http://www.openoffice.org/security/cves/CVE-2010-4253.html): Security Vulnerability in OpenOffice.org related to PNG file processing
> * [CVE-2010-4643](http://www.openoffice.org/security/cves/CVE-2010-4643.html): Security Vulnerability in OpenOffice.org related to TGA file processing
